Description: Fly Fitnes is a MERN stack, ecommerce website that utilizes Redux along with its new hooks: useSelector and useDispatch.
summary: Techs: MERN Stack, Redux, Paypal API
summary2: Fly Fitnes is a MERN stack, ecommerce website that utilizes Redux along with its new hooks: useSelector and useDispatch. As a customer, view items, select quantity and add items to cart. Then checkout with paypal or any major credit card. As an admin, create / edit inventory and manage user accounts. To login as Admin - user id: admin@example.com, password: 123456

Description: A browswer-based instant messaging application that allows users to exchange text and image messages for free.
summary: Techs: MERN Stack, Pusher, Cloudinary
summary2: MERN Chat live is a MERN stack app that utitlizes Pusher. Pusher is a hosted service that adds real-time data functionality to web and mobile applications. Chat istantly with your friends. Upload an avatar, select emojis, create your own room and upload photos!

summary: Techs: Modern HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript
summary2: The Ultimate Responsive Portfolio. This application utilizes all of the most recent advances in Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3 to create a visually stunning and user-friendly experience.

summary: Techs: Modern HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript
summary2: Plan and track all your objectives with 'See It Thru!' Create new Tasks, edit them and then 'drop and drag' them as you make progress.

summary: Techs: Modern HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript
summary2: Explore Mars in one of three actual NASA Mars Rover. Powered by NASA's powerful API, you can access all of the latest pictures taken by the Rovers: Curiosity, Spirit, and Opportunity. Save your favorites!

summary: Techs: Modern HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript
summary2: Strap on your favorite high-tech watch and add, subtract, divide or multiple to your heart's content!

Description: A state of the art chat app that utilizes React and Google's firebase, maps, authentication and places API.

summary2: A mobile app that utilizes React and Google Firebase and Maps. Sign in with your google account or create your own credentials to start tracking downed drones across the world!

summary: Techs: MERN Stack, Redux, JWT, Bcrypt, SCSS

summary: Techs: MERN Stack, Context API

summary: Techs: MERN Stack, Mongoose, Socket.IO
summary2: Google Books allows users to browse and purchase all books that are available on the google-books api. When saving a book to your collection, all logged in users are notified via Socket-IO.

summary: Techs: Javascript, CSS
summary2: Is a Star Wars themed "Role-playing" game in which the user can pick among four different characters and have them battle eachother. The User's player which gain "experience" as the game advances. Additionally, there is a random attack bonus for both the player and opponent.

summary2: Save and track all your gas expenses! No need for data-entry, just take picture, upload and your info will be saved with the help of the google-OCR API. Update or delete any entries. Spot trends and save $$$

Description: A mysql sequilize jquery handlebars express
summary: Techs: MySQL-sequelize, Express, Handlebars.js, jQuery, Flexblox
summary2: A Node, Express, Handlebars, MySQL and Sequelize burger app that lets users input the names of burgers, pick a burger to eat, enter your name and then devour them! The app showcases "sequelize joins" by creating associations between the database tables: Customer and Burger.
